question: In which one of the following nations "Morgan Lewis Windmill", a sugar windmill monument, is located?
explanation: Morgan Lewis Windmill is the last sugar mill to operate in Barbados. The mill stopped its functioning in 1947. It was reopened in 1999. This site was listed in 1996 World Monuments Watch by the World Monuments Fund. It is one of the only two working sugar windmills in the world today.
